name: Left Alone (itch) (Shresth Kumar) (Shresth Kumar)
description:
This is FPS shooter game made in unity. It has different weapons and levels .It consist of old weapons and guns .It has an endless mode in which you can play for an infinite amount of time. It has more than four different types of maps to play in, and there are multiples enemies of different types.

Controls:

Movement: W/A/S/D

Look: Mouse

Sprint: Shift + Movement

Switch Weapons: Number Keys

Shoot/Throw: RMB

Pause: Esc
